channel.title: Recent Reviews Near New York, NY
channel.description: Yelp - Recent Reviews Near New York, NY

item.title: jill w.'s Review of Hartstrings - New York (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place is insanely expensive. The layout looks like a discount shop not a place that carries upscale brands. Plus it is impossible to look through items with a baby carriage due to the tight…

item.title: Aije R.'s Review of Blades Barber Shop - Elmhurst (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I'm extremely picky about my cuts (like most of us)! Look no further if you're looking for a barber! Go and see Moka and he'll get you right..no questions!

item.title: buddha f.'s Review of West Elm - New York (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Purchased a Parsons style table with two Porter leather armchairs. After several years of light use, the "leather" on the chairs are peeling and falling apart. Low quality furniture made poorly. Save…

item.title: Bob N.'s Review of Vicolo - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Amazing service! Andrea was our server and he was impeccable! He was thorough and very helpful! Very good for sitting down and having an authentic Italian dinner for an extended time to talk and…

item.title: Joshua G.'s Review of Hotel Chantelle - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: The food is good, the roof has a great atmosphere at night with candles and decent drinks. The burlesque shows are crap don't come for that. It's just some girl pretending to dance near the bar, not a…

item.title: Kim L.'s Review of Marea - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: So, so, so good. We came for our first anniversary and were treated to an incredible dining experience. The tasting menu was well-paced and exquisite from beginning to end. The service was…

item.title: Erin M.'s Review of Custom House - New York (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: The staff here is very friendly and accommodating. But the food is just kind of average for its cost. They don't have an extensive menu. I've never had anything I didn't like there but I haven't loved…

item.title: Fo S.'s Review of Pegasus - Brooklyn (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: If not the best diner in Brooklyn, IDK where is!?! Must try omelettes, nutella waffles drizzled in fresh berries.

item.title: tiffanie n.'s Review of AU JUS - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
The 7.95 lunch special is very good value...get a Sammy, a side and a drink.
I like the prochetta sandwich more than the roast beef one. I like the roasted potatoes a lot.

item.title: Michelle C.'s Review of PS 450 - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Love this place! Sat at the back bar and had Peter as my bartender. Peter was amazing and the sliders were great. Great music too with live DJ! $33 for bottomless mimosas and Bloody Mary's for 2…

item.title: Rick V.'s Review of Petey's Burger - Long Island City (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: What a great burger! I put this up there with In-N-Out and Shack Shake. ..maybe better. The price is as great as the fries. Fast courteous delivery. Great hangover food or late night for that matter.

item.title: Ron H.'s Review of Sundaes And Cones - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Really good ice cream. Their Asian flavors blow away whatever you can get in Chinatown. I got the black sesame, and it pretty much tasted like real grounded black sesame. Better than what you can get…

item.title: Gabriella K.'s Review of Karma Lounge - Bronx (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: I always believe in giving an establishment a try before making a decision. I went on a Friday and my experience was utterly awful. When I went to order my drinks the female bartender was arguing with…

item.title: Kosta V.'s Review of Mad Dog & Beans - New York (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: Tortilla soup awful. Service not good. Mad dog salad great. I would go to ANY of the other great joints on Stone Street.

item.title: tiffanie n.'s Review of Blue Ribbon Sushi Izakaya - New York (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Very nice space! Came here at 7:30 pm on a Saturday and it was dead. But when I left at 9, it was packed.
Pork ribs were good. Chicken wings were very crispy but bland. It needed some salt. But I…

item.title: Nathalie R.'s Review of Vapiano - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place has a really nice ambiance, food and great prices. This is a very casual restaurant. When I want to have nice time, great food but keep casual and low key, Vapiano is my place.

item.title: Odin Z.'s Review of Abbondanza Trattoria - Jersey City (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: I was surprised at how good this was. We are definitely planning on becoming regulars here. The antipasti appetizer was great for two people to share; I find it hard to find a good antipasti in JC…

item.title: Fo S.'s Review of Spa Castle - College Point (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: Get ready to preview birthday suits. Drinks = Overprices. Amenities are worth it, open sauna rooms, cooling stations, heated pools. The rest will cost you pretty penny.

item.title: Samantha K.'s Review of Soon Beauty Lab - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Always a great experience - friendly staff, good haircuts and cool spot. I used to go to the west side location but have switched to soon east since moving to the east village last year - can't go…

item.title: Ron M.'s Review of Cobble Hill Animal Clinic - Brooklyn (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I LOVE my new neighborhood vet, and so do my little doggies. The staff there loves animals, and Petey and Penny (my dogs) love the staff and get so excited when they go. They really helped with my…

item.title: Esther C.'s Review of Surf Club - New Rochelle (2/5) on Yelp
item.description: (continued from weddingchannel.com) which served as both the place cards and favors since we had a photo booth, were not all displayed for guests. Only a handful of our guests located their frames.…

item.title: Scott K.'s Review of Banter - Brooklyn (2/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Went for a game in the AM. Had the egg pie, it tasted frozen so not in love with it. $4 pints is OK but not an amazing deal. The bartender though was not very cool and the impetus for the review.
She…

item.title: Washer E.'s Review of Vekslers Bar and Food - Brooklyn (2/5) on Yelp
item.description: I've been to Veksler twice now and this is the average of those ratings. The first time we went for dinner and the food was solid, the service very friendly, good ambience, good job, the drinks are…

item.title: Andrew K.'s Review of AMC Dine-in Theatres Essex Green 9 - West Orange (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Was happy to see the new design and comfortable seating in this theater, which is rather close to home and convenient. Wasn't expecting much (maybe the typical TGIF/Applebee's/Chili's type of fair)…

item.title: Kristian M.'s Review of Marseille - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: One of my favorite restaurant in this neighborhood! Food is always spot on! I love having brunch here. Today is the 5th consecutive weekend that I've been having brunch at Marseille. Very well trained…

item.title: John H.'s Review of Belstaff - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: About a month ago I was on the hunt for a new jack and after looking at the website a few jackets caught my eye, and so I made my way to the Upper East Side. Walking in I was politely greeted by…

item.title: Carol K.'s Review of King Hong Restaurant - Fort Lee (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: I don't know who wrote the other reviews, but this was the most tasteless Chinese food I've ever had. Based on the reviews, I thought I'd give it a try. The delivery took 2 hours (they said 45…

item.title: Jas S.'s Review of Moti Mahal Delux - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Amazing food and exceptional service! The GM Tiku personally took care of us and we were absolutely amazed with the food. One of the best Chicken Makhni I have ever had.

item.title: Anne B.'s Review of Freddy's Food Market - New York (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: What a terrible store. Everything is about a dollar more than every other place in the neighborhood and the selection is so inconsistent that you never know what you will find. Go in one day and get…

item.title: Joanna S.'s Review of Appellation - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This review is long overdue, having been a customer for the past few years. Whenever I go I ask for a suggestion and have been pleased with every single bottle! In addition to the wine, they have a…

item.title: Tony A.'s Review of Whynot Coffee & Wine - New York (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Corner of Christopher and Gay Streets. Great location. The big windows are good, but I was served one of the worst cups of coffee I have ever had the misfortune of purchasing. There is no excuse for…

item.title: Maya D.'s Review of Galli Restaurant - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: This place is really amaze. I am always surprised at how empty it always is considering how solid the food is. The rolls they give you to start with are one of the main reasons I come here, they are…

item.title: Rose L.'s Review of Asian Grill - East Rutherford (4/5) on Yelp
item.description:
Stopped in today to satisfy a need for dim sum. Specifically a desire for steamed and baked roast pork buns.
Desire met. Craving satisfied. Got about 5-6 different dim sums. Shu Mai was ok a…

item.title: Rebecca E.'s Review of Hunan Wok - Little Falls (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: I wouldn't say this is the Ritz, but my husband and I have always enjoyed the classic dishes we order from here, like barbecued pork ribs, pork fried rice, and General Tso's chicken. We usually get…

item.title: Preet K.'s Review of Taste Of Lahore - Jackson Heights (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: I have given this place three chances, and have gotten diarrhea each and every time. The food also took over an hour to come even though I am only three blocks away. Taste of a long, painful night.…

item.title: Cat B.'s Review of Reservoir Restaurant - South Orange (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Let me start by saying that if I could give this place no stars, I would. First, the place is dirty and very out dated and the wait staff looked bothered and annoyed at our very presence. We were…

item.title: Lesly L.'s Review of Gansevoort Meatpacking NYC - New York (3/5) on Yelp
item.description: Love the view here! The ambiance is elegant and great house music! Came here on a Friday night and there wasn't that many people but the atmosphere is still great..

item.title: Ms. Brooklyn L.'s Review of Mexicue - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Love this food. I make a trip from Brooklyn to Mexicue just to have that BBq Brisket Sandwich and roasted cream corn. I'm too old to be pregnant, but I crave this sandwich like a pregnant woman.…

item.title: Brian M.'s Review of The Way Station - Brooklyn (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: The servers are friendly enough, the drinks are almost reasonably priced & it's fun to pretend to be the Doctor while taking a shit in the TARDIS bathroom.I enjoyed the atmosphere. It's decorated…

item.title: Lisa G.'s Review of Taras Bulba - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description:
I went to this place for dinner with the family. I was very excited since my family is from Kiev/Cherkasy to try some Ukrainian food which I have grew up on.
We got a table near the back in a…

item.title: Lindsay P.'s Review of Handybook - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: My first appointment for house cleaning ended in disappointment - a cleaner who could not show up due to a personal problem - so the company sent another cleaner on a different day AND gave me a free…

item.title: Lavinia M.'s Review of Hill and Dale - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: I loved everything about this lovely restaurant. When you enter you feel as if you have stepped back in time to the roaring twenties. The décor of the restaurant is tailored to the name: Hill and…

item.title: Rinku U.'s Review of Raymond Cash, PC - Forest Hills (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: This lawyer was hired to handle a nonpayment landlord-tenant eviction case. Raymond Cash overcharges and provides inadequate services. His staff is very rude, especially Eli Acevedo the paralegal.…

item.title: Tom R.'s Review of Han Chon Food Court - Ridgefield (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: We love coming here for various authentic Korean dishes. Reasonable pricing and cafe style seating.

item.title: Aileen S.'s Review of Kimganae Korean Restaurant - Flushing (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Filling, tasty, and cheap! The dine-in area is small, but I was able to get a table pretty quickly on an early Saturday evening. Will definitely be returning. The only disappointment was that they no…

item.title: Rahul N.'s Review of Saravana Bhavan - Manhattan (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Pathetic service. The guys are outright rude, guess they feel entitled because the food tastes good.

item.title: Talia H.'s Review of Crepe Cafe Joli & Cocoa Bar - Manhattan (1/5) on Yelp
item.description: Bad service and bad quality. I was disappointed to say the least.I asked for the strawberry and Nutella. It was ok, presented in a mediocre plate picked from the corner store. I ask the young man…

item.title: Katie S.'s Review of Golden Cicada Tavern - Jersey City (3/5) on Yelp
item.description:
This is a place everyone must go to once - and then again.
I have this feeling every experience will be different. From the various crowds, streaming videos on YouTube, you never know what you are…

item.title: Eichele M.'s Review of Angry Chicken - New York (4/5) on Yelp
item.description: Just had my first Angry chicken meal, and it won't be the last. The meal was very tasty! The dinner comes with a whole rotisserie chicken, veggies (red & green peppers, onions, potatoes and broccoli)…

item.title: Michelle L.'s Review of Best Bagel and Coffee - New York (5/5) on Yelp
item.description: Best Bagel & Coffee literally has the best bagels (I've never had their coffee though, so I can't speak to that). My office is in the Penn Station area, right around the corner from here, and this is…
